post:
I have a few Low Voltage units available. These units include SSD disks, DDR3 Memory, And Sandy Bridge processors that support VT-x w/ EPT, and Speed Step. These units also have wifi cards included, and users may feel free to create their own ad-hoc network with other users if they wish.  

Network is currently cogent only, However new providers are being added with an expected launch date within this quarter. These upgrades to the network will also bring the ability to offer BGP sessions as well as new ip space.  

LV-1  

Intel Celeron 1037U 1.8GHz  
4 GB DDR3 Ram  
60 GB SSD Disk  
10mbps dedicated  
1gbps burst  
5 IPv4  

$33/M  
[Order](https://billing.nodepop.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=16)  

ServerBear: http://serverbear.com/benchmark/2013/11/12/RNundDQ4XAObYqvn  

Test IP: 38.83.198.25  
Test File: 38.83.198.25/100mb.test  

Location: 59 Innerbelt rd. Somerville MA. (Boston)
